name: a.m. Monday Zombies
description:
Monday morning zombies want only one thing: coffee. Arm yourself with your softest plush weapon and protect your caffeinated slime skin ...

⬅️ ➡️ : Move
⬆️ : jump
⬇️ : Hit
Space : Start/Pause

F12 : Take a screenshot
Alt + Return: Fullscreen mode

Version 0.12.0
